Strong Coffee, Strong Roots About Cafe gue

Founded in 2021 by the Anak Komplek's, our establishment has been serving up rich coffee sourced from artisan farmers in various regions of west and central java. We are dedicated to travelling the world, finding the best coffee, and bringing back to you here in our cafe.

We guarantee that you will fall in lust with our decadent blends the moment you walk inside until you finish your last sip. Join us for your daily routine, an outing with friends, or simply just to enjoy some alone time.
